summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Galer Street from Queen Anne Avenue to the west margin of Seventh Avenue West et al in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt under Ordinance No. 18688, creating Local Improvement District No. 1789 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
